piiksuma.database

Class UpdateMapper<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • piiksuma.database.Mapper<T>
      • piiksuma.database.UpdateMapper<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Mapped class type. Used to check asigments while mapping

    public class UpdateMapper<T>
extends Mapper<T>
    Database conection and update wrapper. Automatically maps updated data
    Author:
    luastan, CardamaS99, danimf99, alvrogd, OswaldOswin1, Marcos-marpin

      • add

        public UpdateMapper<T> add(T object)
        Adds an object to de update pool. It toes not get updated on the database until method update(boolean) gets called.
        Parameters:
        object - Object to be updated
        Returns:
        Current UpdateMapper instance

      • addAll

        public UpdateMapper<T> addAll(T... objects)
        Adds multiple objects to the update pool. Check add(Object) in order to get extra info about the update pool behaviour.
        Parameters:
        objects - Objects to be updated in the database
        Returns:
        UpdateMapper instance
